summary: Results-driven programming enthusiast since young; I am a graduate in computer science from the University of East Anglia skilled in problem solving with a strong effort to constantly improve.
footerText: I built this website using React.

experience.title: Full-stack web developer internship
experience.description: During the 2nd year of my studies, I was accepted as a full-stack web developer intern at Robot Mascot where I worked together with a team to build a bespoke e-commerce website for a client.

experience.title: UEA App Development Internship
experience.description: In the summer of my 2nd year at UEA, I successfully applied for an internship hosted by the university where I worked in a team with other interns to develop a mobile application for a client using the Scrum Agile framework.

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
experience.description: I was hired as a freelance web developer to maintain and add new features/content to the bespoke e-commerce website that was developed and launched during the internship.

experience.title: Associate Tutor
experience.description: In my final year, I was asked to be take on the role of an associate tutor and be a lab assistant for a 2nd year computer science module for that semester. I would provide assistance and teaching to students that requested it in the computer labs for that module.

education.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: I achieved a first-class honours in BSc Computer Science at UEA with 79% overall and 85.5% in my dissertation/project. During this course, I studied graphics, computer vision, networking, parallel computation, and more. I was awarded best individual performance by a BSc Computing Student in my final year.
